## 3. Examples

EXAMPLE: Basic Problem
If 2x + 5 = 15, what is the value of x?
A. 2
B. 5
C. 7
D. 10
E. 15

SOLUTION:
Try C (7):
2(7) + 5
= 14 + 5
= 19
≠ 15
Doesn't work

Try B (5):
2(5) + 5
= 10 + 5
= 15
✓ Works!
